job_history.work_description: Hired by their CPA firm to handle all accounting and job cost Reporting.
Hired by their CPA firm to handle all accounting functions.
Installed new Peachtree Accounting System. Installed new computer system using a local area network and Added a Web site.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 25 years of experience handling all aspects of accounting, including job cost reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Handled job cost reporting and other accounting functions for multiple CPA firms, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: System Implementation
skills.explanation: Installed new accounting systems and computer networks, showing a solid working proficiency in system implementation.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Handled multiple projects, including the installation of a new accounting system and a computer network, but the extent of project management experience is unclear.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: No direct evidence of leadership experience, despite extensive accounting experience.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: No direct evidence of Microsoft Excel experience, despite extensive accounting experience.
